description:
Lightweight, breathable, and comfortable, the Lefroy is a technical short designed for warm weather and long trails. Made from Aequora AirPerm™ – a fabric combining nylon’s strength with elastane’s performance stretch – the Lefroy dries fast and really breathes. The trim fit is streamlined and a gusseted crotch adds freedom of movement. Five pockets keep essentials accessible, and the low-profile adjustable waistband holds tight and rides comfortably under a pack.

Updated with additional pockets and revised patterning for better fit and comfort.
name: Arcteryx Lefroy Shorts, 11" Inseam - Mens
